SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_CLASS_NO, BOARD_NO, THUMBNAIL, TITLE, DETAIL, TRAINER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TYPE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE_NO FROM "ORDER" JOIN BOARD ON (ORDER_CLASS_NO = BOARD_NO) JOIN TRAINER ON (BOARD.TRAINER_NO = TRAINER.TRAINER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON (BOARD.CLASS_NO = BOARD_TYPE.BOARD_TYPE_NO) WHERE ORDER_MEMBER_NO = #{orderMemberNo} ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
